choices: Tell him you have another idea for his piss
11112.content:
You and your Lycanroc friend Quincy have been gaming for the last 4 hours. It was Saturday night, he was over at your house for a sleepover. You two have known each other ever since you were young boys. Since then, you and Quincy have been attending the same school and spent almost every moment possible together. Every other weekend is a sleepover, alternating between your house and his house. As the years passed, not only has your friendship deepened, your feelings too. You fell in love with him.

One night you couldn’t hold it back anymore and confessed your feels. To your surprise, he felt the same way. Then you kissed. Quincy and you have been dating for a while now, although keeping it a secret from others. Neither of your parents’ have any idea how much making out, dick-sucking, and ass-fucking goes on in your rooms whilst the doors are closed. Tonight though, both of you had a fair share of each other’s bodies in the afternoon, before your parents came home. When they did return, the two of you swiftly transitioned into an intense gaming session. You played a variety of competitive games such as racing and fighting, as well as a cooperative RPG you two have been slowly working through.

1:36 AM. Quincy yawned as he put down his controller. “I guess you win again. Just lucky I guess,” he said as he stretched his stiff joints. The canine wore his usual pajamas; red and blue plaid pants and a single colored T-shirt. He’s a Midday Lycanroc with light brown and white fur, with a few darker brown tufts in between. He’s tough and can even be a little intimidating on the outside, but once you got to know him, you learned on the inside he’s a big softie that loves to cuddle and kiss.

“Winning 4 times in a row is lucky?” You reply with chuckle and a pat on the back, “nice try though. You know, you did choose the game I’m best at.”

“Yeah, whatever. Thought I could beat your ass,” he mumbled. “Be right back, gotta take a leak.” Quincy got up and started towards the bathroom connected to your room. What do you do?
11112.title: Quincy's gotta pee

info.brief_description: Male Anthro Pokemon get all fetish-y, and they're into so many different things!
info.description:
All these male Pokemon have many different kinks and fetishes, but which ones will they choose? It's up to your decisions on what they do next!

1. Make sure it's a fetish, obviously.
2. Try to be as realistic as possible.
3. Do as many parts as you want.
4. Female Pokemon can be mentioned, but they never appear.
5. If it's macro fetish, the tinies are just generic furries, not actual Pokemon, keep that in mind.
6. Go and have fun with whatever the Pokemon are gonna get themselves into!
